metadata.title: CVE-2024-36611 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Symfony v7.07, a security vulnerability was identified in theFormLoginAuthenticator component, where it failed to adequately handlecases where the username or password field of a login request is empty.This flaw could lead to various security risks, including improperauthentication logic handling or denial of service. NOTE: the Supplier hasconcluded that this is a false report.

criterions.comment: symfony package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
